title: Fortinet FortiWeb ApacheCookie_parse Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to bypass authentication on affected installations of Fortinet FortiWeb. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the ApacheCookie_parse method. The issue results from the lack of proper verification of a cryptographic signature. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to bypass authentication on the system.
addtionnal_details: Fortinet has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://fortiguard.fortinet.com/psirt/FG-IR-25-945
timeline:
2025-10-10 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-12-16 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-12-16 - Advisory Updated
